props.title: WE ARE SPATIAL SAUCE
props.copy: We infuse creative ideas with innovative technology and spatial design to  create experiences that people love and remember; for retail, digital placemaking, experiential marketing, entertainment and communications.

props.title: MAKING MAGIC
props.copy: Our speciality is “magical” technology, so our concepts are more often than not based on a tech driven engagement, but they will always be highly relevant and human at heart.

props.text: We never forget that after all is said and done we create experiences for people, and we will only succeed when they absolutely love what we do.

props.title: We use magical tech to infuse awesome ideas into amazing spaces.
MULTI-SENSORY
props.copy: We use magical technology to infuse awesome ideas into amazing spaces, with a vision to take our audience “beyond the expected” and allow them to experience with all their senses.

props.title: FROM START TO FINISH
props.copy: We can provide end-to-end solutions from ideation to installation and management, or bring your idea to life alongside your team and partners, as and where required.

content:
• Experience concept development.
  • Technology consulting for experiential activations.
  • Immersive and innovative technology development.
  • Hardware and display setups
  • Creative development and production services

• Live data visualisations / interactions.
  • Spatial / stand / industrial design (with the help of our partners).
  • Fabrication, printing and installation (with the help of our partners).
  • Brand ambassador / promo staffing and management (with the help of our partners).

props.title: We create custom and unique applications.
SMART TECH
props.copy: We create custom and unique applications that take advantage of the smartest technologies out there, creating seamless and exciting interactions.

props.title: TRUSTED PARTNERS
props.copy: We oversee the spatial design, fabrication and installation of our ideas through our best in class partners.

content:
• AR / VR / XR / MR
  • Touch screen and interactive table setups and custom content.
  • Gesture / body / finger / face tracking based interactions & games.
  • Demographics / sentiment recognition driven interactions
  • Sound / speech recognition based experiences.

• Deep learning AI based object / product recognition & contextual content presentation.
  • Digital photo booths / live lenses & filters.
  • Sensor triggered content experiences (movement, proximity, acceleration and more).
  • Interactive and immersive projection mapping.
  • Robotics and custom device creation (through partners).
